song_name: Red Streamer Battle - Paper Mario The Origami King
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Red Streamer Battle - Paper Mario The Origami King is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Red Streamer Battle - Paper Mario The Origami King has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Major,  and G Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
